Love Family Park Festival, Frankfurt

June 13 @ 8:00 am - 5:00 pm

| €36

Event Navigation

  • « Meadows in the Mountains, Bulgaria
  • Nós - Festival Multiplicidade, Rio de Janeiro »

With a long sightseeing tour across the region, we finally have found what we were looking for: the new Love Family Park! It’s located in the heart of the Rhein-Main-region, super easy to travel to but still embedded in nature with a view you will instantly fall in love with. That’s the Messepark in Mainz but that isn’t the only good news we have for you: Along with plenty of Love and our Family, we will also bring the Park with us to the local capital. Some of you won’t even recognise the Messepark when you join us on 6th of July as we will transform the area into a wild and green Open-Air-oasis! Expect deep green meadows, refreshing water-curtains, vast awnings and many, many more stuff to create a beautiful Park that fits our Love Family. For you, there’s nothing much more left than grabbing your friends, building your beach shelter, relax and let yourself flow into a 12 hours musical journey. A cool breaze of air and the warm summer sun will do the rest. We’re totally amazed and really looking forward to celebrate the most beautiful summer ever day with you.

Spread the love, meet the family and feel a warm welcome at our new park!

http://www.residentadvisor.net/promoter.aspx?id=19980
